channel.title: Matter for Ramanathan Kathiresan
channel.itunes:author: Matter
channel.itunes:summary: These are the audio versions of stories saved in your Matter queue.

item.title: Gaming the Smiling Curve (Stratechery Article 2-1-2022)
item.description: Gaming, to a much greater extent than many other industries, is a zero sum game: time spent playing one title is time not spent playing another one.
item.content:encoded: Gaming, to a much greater extent than many other industries, is a zero sum game: time spent playing one title is time not spent playing another one.
item.itunes:author: Matter
item.itunes:summary: Gaming, to a much greater extent than many other industries, is a zero sum game: time spent playing one title is time not spent playing another one.

item.title: The 2021 Stratechery Year in Review (Stratechery Article 12-20-2021)
item.description: Stratechery Interviews This year’s Stratechery interviews included: Jay Goldberg about chips, Intel, and Apple. Eric Seufert about advertising and Apple versus Facebook (and a follow-up interview about the impact of ATT).
item.content:encoded: Stratechery Interviews This year’s Stratechery interviews included: Jay Goldberg about chips, Intel, and Apple. Eric Seufert about advertising and Apple versus Facebook (and a follow-up interview about the impact of ATT).
